awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A taped version of the stage play about a hideously deformed 19th-century London man and how he managed to triumph over his disease.
plot: A taped version of the stage play about a hideously deformed 19th-century London man and how he managed to triumph over his disease.
title: The Elephant Man
